problem.markdown:
>>The SUMX function takes in two parameters. What is the second parameter?<<
( ) The table containing the rows for which the expression will be evaluated. (x) The expression to be evaluated for each row of the table. ( ) A comma separated list of Boolean expression that defines a filter. ( ) A table expression that defines a filter.
[explanation] The SUMX function takes as its first argument a table, or an expression that returns a table. The second argument is a column that contains the numbers you want to sum, or an expression that evaluates to a column. [explanation]
